TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeStatementCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

remarks.format:
## Remarks The CodeStatementCollection class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement> objects.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the CodeStatementCollection class. The example creates a new instance of the class and uses several methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove statements at a specific index point.
[!code-cpp[CodeStatementCollectionExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.codedom.codesta_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[CodeStatementCollectionExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.codedom.codesta_1.cs)] [!code-vb[CodeStatementCollectionExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.codedom.codesta_1.vb)]

The destination array is multidimensional.
-or-
The number of elements in the is greater than the available space between the index of the target array specified by the parameter and the end of the target array.
The parameter is less than the target array's minimum index.
